author: Tabletop Minions
description:
If you get your wargaming miniatures built, but you can't seem to paint them... it's usually a problem with where your head's at. We can fix it and get you painting.

Get 30-days free of Audible and a free audiobook (your choice!): http://www.audibletrial.com/tabletopminions

Vince Venturella and I made ANOTHER game! Check out Reign in Iron - miniatures-agnostic robots vs. demons skirmish combat at http://www.reigninirongame.com

SAVE 5% OFF YOUR ENTIRE ORDER at The Army Painter website: https://affiliate.thearmypainter.com/click?campaign_id=1&ref_id=10 and use code 'FactoryUncle5' at checkout! Saves you money and helps support the channel. A win-win!

I'm now a partner on Twitch! I paint minis every Friday morning and Monday night, and sometimes take paint breaks (play video games poorly). Follow me: http://www.twitch.tv/tabletopminions

Official Tabletop Minions t-shirts: http://www.tabletopminions.org

Help support the channel on Patreon, and get access to the Discord: http://www.p
title: Can't Get Your Minis Painted? FIX YOUR HEAD
